zh.title: 以太坊/美元技术分析：[震荡整理走势]
zh.content:
当前以太坊/美元（ETH/USD）价格为2977.07，呈现出震荡整理的走势。价格在2985.08的高点和2952.38的低点之间波动，显示出市场在这个区间内的犹豫。短期内，若价格突破2985.08，将可能引发进一步的上涨，而跌破2952.38则可能引发下行压力。

技术指标方面，MACD的值为34.34，显示出当前市场存在一定的买盘动能，表明短期内多头偏强。然而，由于缺乏RSI和信号线的具体值，需谨慎解读这一信号，密切关注后续的价格动向。SMA(20)在2854.60，作为支撑位，对价格下行提供了一定的保护。

从支撑和阻力位来看，2952.38可以视为短期支撑位，若价格跌破该水平，则可能测试更低的支撑区间。相应地，2985.08是当前的阻力位，突破后有望迎来新的买盘。建议投资者可以在2952.38附近寻找买入机会，同时设定合理的止损，以控制潜在风险。

en.title: Ethereum vs US Dollar Technical Analysis
en.content:
Ethereum has shown resilience in its recent price action, currently trading at $2977.07 with a slight 24-hour change of 0.67%. This subtle upward movement suggests that the market sentiment is cautiously optimistic. The price has tested key levels, reaching a high of $2985.08 and a low of $2952.38. A sustained break above the $2985 level could signal a bullish continuation, potentially paving the way for a retest of the psychological resistance at $3000.

In terms of indicators, the absence of the RSI(14) limits our ability to assess overbought or oversold conditions definitively. However, the MACD at 34.34 indicates positive momentum, suggesting that buyers are in control. The Simple Moving Average (SMA) of 20 periods at $2854.60 serves as a critical support level. A pullback towards this SMA could present an attractive buying opportunity for traders looking to capitalize on potential reversals.

Support levels are seen at $2952.38 and $2854.60, while resistance is established at $2985 and the psychological barrier of $3000. If the price dips to the $2952 level, it might trigger buying interest, while strong selling pressure could emerge if the price closes below the SMA. Traders should monitor these levels closely to navigate potential volatility.

For trading strategies, a conservative approach would be to wait for a confirmed breakout above $2985 before entering long positions. Conversely, setting stop-loss orders below $2952 can help mitigate risks in case of a bearish reversal. Keeping an eye on volume trends accompanying price movements will also provide additional insight into market strength, informing better trading decisions.
